magician.description: For each level up, when equipped with a Staff, weapon's P-ATK & M-ATK +1%.
For each level up, DMG from Lightning Bolt +3%.
For each level up, DMG from Overcharging +2%.
For each level up, MP consumption -2%.
When using Fog, increase Move SPD +10%.
For each level up, M-CRIT DMG +2%.
For each level up, CAST SPD +1%.
For each level up, DMG from Snow Storm +2%.
When using Ice Shield, DEF bonus +20%. The enemy Move SPD debuff will also be increase by 20%.
For each level up, Extreme Magic's duration +1 sec.
For each level up, M-CRIT Rate +1%.
For each level up, DMG from Hellfire +3%.
For each level up, all Elemental Resistance +1%.
For each level up, Resistance Collapse's duration +1 sec.
When using Elemental Guardian, increase Fire, Ice and Lightning Resistance +8, instead of +5.
For each level up, DMG from Fusion Reaction +2%.

illusionist.description: For each level up, M-CRIT Rate +1%.
For each level up, DMG from Deadly Icicle +2%.
When using Jester's Frenzy, Deadly Icicle's damage reduction decreased to 25%.
For each level up, DMG from Aerolite +2%.
For each level up, when equipped with a Grimoire, weapon's P-ATK & M-ATK +1%.
For each level up, CAST SPD +1%.
For each level up, Stimulation's duration +1 sec.
For each level up, Chrono Rewind's cooldown time -4%.
For each level up, Ancient Call's duration +1 sec.
When using Ineffective Magic, received M-DMG and M-DMG reflection bonuses +20%.
For each level up, M-CRIT DMG +2%.
When using Psionic Focus, Move SPD +10%, M-CRIT Rate bonus +20% and duration +5 sec.
When using Hypnotic Eye, DMG received bonus +20% and duration +2 sec.
For each level up, Max MP +1%.
When using Mind Surge, MP recovery +20% and duration +2 sec.

warlock.description: For each level up, CAST SPD +1%.
For each level up, M-CRIT Rate +1%.
For each level up, DMG from Nightmare Attack +3%.
For each level up, Wicked Pact duration +1 sec.
For each level up, DMG from Death Sentence +2%.
When using Death Threats, P-Healing penalty +20% and duration +2 sec.
For each level up, M-CRIT DMG +2%.
For each level up, Max HP +1%.
For each level up, Blood Conversion cooldown time -3%.
When using Tribute, M-CRIT Rate and Dark bonuses +20%.
For each level up, Plague Carrier duration +1 sec.
When using Dark Parasites, area of effect +6 meters.
For each level up, when equipped with a Grimoire, weapon's P-ATK & M-ATK +1%.
For each level up, DMG from Shadow Arrow +3%.
For each level up, Max MP +2%.
When using Wild Shout, M-ATK bonus +10% and duration +2 sec.

luminary.description: For each level up, Cast SPD +1%.
When using Light Split, receive 2 stacks of "Holy Affinity".
For each level up, DMG from Aurora Light Destruction +3%.
For each level up, DMG from Dead Silence Formation +3%.
For each level up, Holy Prayer cooldown time -5%.
For each level up, when equipped with Sword or Rapier, weapon's M-ATK +1%. When equipped with a Greatsword, weapon's M-ATK +2%.
For each level up, DMG from Light Split +3%.
For each level up, Gateway to Darkness cooldown time -6%.
For each level up, Move SPD +2%.
For each level up, M-CRIT Rate +1%.
When using Black Cut, receive 2 stacks of "Shroud of Darkness".
For each level up, M-CRIT DMG +2%.
For each level up, DMG from Black Cut +2%.
For each level up, DMG from Shadow Cross +3%.
For each level up, DMG from Bursting Light +3%.
For each level up, Dark Shadow Sacrifice cooldown time -5%.
